Key Match Events: Alex Hales scored 53 runs in 40 balls on his first England outing since March 2019
England won the first T20 international in Pakistan for almost 17 years with a six-wicket success
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Alex Hales' first England outing since March 2019 when he was jettisoned in the aftermath of a failed recreational drugs test
Others: England restricted Pakistan to 158 for seven in front of a sell-out 35,000 crowd at Karachiâ€™s National Stadium
Debutant Luke Wood claimed an impressive three wickets
Harry Brook finished the game with a fluent 42 not out, including the winning four in the final over
